altTitles.zh: 蛮妻有毒：腹黑大叔宠上天

altTitles.zh-ro: Man Qi You Du, Fu Hei Lao Gong Chong Shang Tian

altTitles.en: Toxic Love: Pampered Silly by the Black-bellied Husband

description.en: Zu Sheng Xia, a rebellious, wild and intractable troublemaker who fights a lot at school. Leng Ye Chen, the third master of Leng family. He looks cold and serious on the outside, but deep inside he's a flirty and scheming fox. The first time they meet, Sheng Xia falls for him, but having sworn loyalty as her father's brother, he's her third uncle?! No worries! She is smarter than that! Come and see her how to take down the cold, elegant and scheming General step by step.
